ios.sim.debug.build: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild -workspace ios/CI_CD.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme CI_CD -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build  -quiet | xcpretty
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X

ios.sim.release.build: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild -workspace ios/CI_CD.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme CI_CD -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build  -quiet | xcpretty
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone Xs
